sentence.Network_en: What are you reciting from the Analects for? "
He is well versed in the Analects of Confucius.
A Selection of the Analects sells many copies on the internet.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Latin from Greek analekta 'things gathered up', from analegein 'pick up', from ana- 'up' + legein 'gather'

means.word_mean: 1. a collection of excerpts from a literary work
